6.70. umbra.ui.inputAccelerators¶

inputAccelerators.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines the Application input accelerators objects.

Others:

6.70.1. Module Attributes¶

umbra.ui.inputAccelerators.LOGGER¶

6.70.2. Functions¶

umbra.ui.inputAccelerators.getEditorCapability(editor, capability)[source]¶

This definition returns given editor capability.

Parameters:
  • editor – Document editor. ( QWidget )
  • capability – Capability to retrieve. ( String )
Returns:

Capability. ( Object )
